resources.string:
"
Title Generator was designed and developed by Lauri Kosonen."
"


General"
"

Press the button on the lower right corner of the screen to" "generate new" "titles." "The chosen category affects which words will appear. You can see the" "displayed category on the top of the screen. You can change it, along with many other" "things, in the dropdown menu at the upper right corner of the screen."
"

Press the" "Custom template" "button next to the title generation button to" "activate the custom template mode:" "
Write something in the text field which has now appeared and generate new titles to see" "all of the titles become what you wrote. Add a" "hash #" "into the text and" "generate new titles; a random word has appeared to that place in each title."
"

Mutators" "are short codes which allow you to customize words' forms and" "properties and limit what kind of words you'll get. Add parentheses right after a hash #" "and, within them, write any of the mutators listed below to have control over the outcome." 
Example:" "The #(pc) of the #"
"

For any word, you can have" "multiple mutators" "separated with a comma." "If there are more than one category mutator, there's a chance for any of them to take" "effect. Words without a category mutator will obey the displayed category." "
Example:" "#(ki, co) #(\?, A)"
"

Category mutators"
"

- All categories:" "0" "or" "*" "
- Kind (adjectives):" "1" "or" "ki" "
- Concept:" "2" "or" "co" "
- Substance:" "3" "or" "su" "
- Thing:" "4" "or" "th" "
- Person & Creature:" "5" "or" "pc" "
- Action (verbs):" "6" "or" "ac" "
- Place & Time:" "7" "or" "pt" "
- Grammatical particle:" "8" "or" "gp"
"

Word form mutators"
"

- Plural:" "+" "or" "s" "
- Possible plural (50 % chance):" "~" "
- Comparative (Kind):" >" "
- Superlative (Kind):" >>" "
- Manner (Kind):" "ly" "
- Present participle (Action):" "ing" "
- Present tense (Action):" "pr" "
- Past tense (Action):" "ed" "or" "d" "
- Past perfect tense (Action):" "pp" "
- Noun (Action):" "n" "
- Actor (Action and Concept):" "er" "
- Random word form:" "\?"
"

Other mutators"
"

- Chain mutators together:" "," "
- Uppercase:" "A" "
- Lowercase:" "a" "
- Acronym:" "." "
- Possessive:" "'" "or" "'s" "
- Preposition (Action):" "pre" "
- Starts with a vowel:" ":a" "
- Starts with a consonant:" ":b" "
- Remove end vowels:" "/-a" "
- Remove end consonants:" "/-b" "
- Remove letters from beginning:" ":-1" "through" ":-9" "
- Remove letters from end:" "/-1" "through" "/-9" "
- Reverse word:" "r" "
- Jumble the word's letters:" "j" "
- Remove word (50 % chance):" "x" "
- Copy previous word:" "#" "
- Copy previous word's category:" "c" "
- Copy non-category mutators*:" "&" "
- Copy all mutators*:" "="
"

*The copy mutators (#, c, &, =) and the word removal mutator (x) won't be copied."
"

Custom template examples"
"

To ease the learning of the custom template system, there are some ready-made" "templates for you to use. Open the" "Custom template examples" "submenu from the" "dropdown menu and select an option there. You'll see titles tailored to that template and" "you can also edit it to your liking.

"
